short_summary: Electrical services, facility maintenance and repair
description: On an as and when required basis, at a number of Correctional Service Canada Institutions.
full_summary:
Title
================
EZ899 – 241853 – CSC – Electrical Services Standing Offer
Various Institutions, British Columbia

Reference
---------
WS4617385760-Doc4617892281

### Tender Details

*   **Publication Date**: June 3, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: July 24, 2024, 2:00 PM
*   **Amendment Date**: July 17, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 5, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: July 24, 2025

### Solicitation Overview

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is inviting contractors to participate in a competitive Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Electrical Services. This RFSO is for the provision of electrical services for low-dollar value work at various CSC institutions in British Columbia.

The services to be provided include:

*   Electrical system services
*   Electronic controls installation service
*   Electrical equipment maintenance and repair service
*   Electrical engineering services

### Contact Information

For more information and to obtain the solicitation document, please visit the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19899172?extsite=MTk4OTkxNzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:

*   Brandie Klyne (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Please note that the tender closing date has already expired.**
